pageContext.claim: “But I was told by a general who I had to fire, I said, ‘General, how long before we get 100 percent of the caliphate? He said, ‘Sir, two years.’”
pageContext.analysis: This appears to be a reference to former Defense Secretary James Mattis. Trump did not fire Mattis; he resigned and bluntly cited several disagreements on issues such as Trump's demand to withdraw U.S. troops from Syria. (Trump has since walked back this demand and agreed to keep some troops there.)
